text: Morocco participated at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics in Buenos Aires, Argentina from 6 October to 18 October 2018. ==Medals== Medals awarded to participants of mixed-NOC (combined) teams are represented in italics. These medals are not counted towards the individual NOC medal tally. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport ! Event ! Morocco qualified two athletes during the WORLD TAEKWONDO QUALIFICATION TOURNAMENT FOR BUENOS AIRES 2018 YOUTH OLYMPIC GAMES. * Girls' -55 kg - Safia Salih * Girls' +63 kg - Fatima-Ezzahra Aboufaras
